text: is there anyway to set the defaults for a repeater? Problem: I have a footer module and want to set the defaults for the social icon without having to edit it on every page. Yes I know I can make a global custom module, but it need to not be a global module

HubDB rows with order, icons, links, text, alts, etc (one per social link) then you can set default count for the repeated to 4 or something. On looping through it, check against the values of each item in the module.group array for whatever the “defaults” are that you set up in the Custom Module and {% if item.whatever == ‘default’ %} render everything using your HubDB rows
